input: 1. user: A serene sunset over a calm sea with gentle waves, featuring a wooden sailboat with crisp white sails drifting gracefully. Golden hues from setting sun paint the sky in soft peach tones, dotted by wispy clouds, while seagulls soar majestically in the distance, all imbued with a sense of peaceful serenity.
